experience.title: Software Engineer
description: Collaborating in a dynamic team to develop complex web applications, utilizing PHP, Laravel, and Vue.js.
Leading code reviews and ensuring adherence to coding standards, while utilizing CI/CD pipelines for quality assurance.
Employing Docker for efficient deployment processes and maintaining robust development environments.
Actively participating in agile ceremonies, including daily standups and sprint retrospectives for effective project management.
Integrating third-party APIs to enhance product features and user experiences.
Engaging in high-level project discussions and providing innovative solutions for technical challenges.

description: Collaborating in a dynamic team to develop complex web applications, utilizing PHP, Laravel, and Vue.js.
Leading code reviews and ensuring adherence to coding standards, while utilizing CI/CD pipelines for quality assurance.
Employing Docker for efficient deployment processes and maintaining robust development environments.
Actively participating in agile ceremonies, including daily standups and sprint retrospectives for effective project management.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
description: Independently designing and delivering end-to-end solutions for diverse client projects using PHP, Laravel, and Vue.js.
Managing projects efficiently with tools like Trello and clear communication via Slack.
Establishing collaborative channels with mobile developers for seamless backend API integration.
Utilizing Git and GitHub for version control to ensure organized codebase management.
Translating client requirements into innovative technical solutions, emphasizing code quality and timely delivery.
Contributing to design discussions and maintaining high coding standards through thorough code reviews.

education.title: BS in Information Technology
education.description: Completed a Bachelor of Science in Information Technology, specializing in software development and programming. Acquired in-depth knowledge of development methodologies, software engineering principles, and programming languages to excel as a software developer.
